Meanwhile inside the Ark,

Santon and Bump have the covered form of Rodimus=
 laying on a bed, all
manner of sensors are pointed at him, different view =
screens showing
readouts of his vital signs and life signs. Legacy is in th=
ere as
well, his advanced engieneering and technological skills definitly a=
n
asset under these occasions.

Santon, the one taking the lead during this=
 operation looks over at
Kup and Silverbolt who are still standing in the r=
oom, the power of
his starte saying all that needed to be said, it was time=
 for them to
leae so that the operation could begin.

"Come" said Silverbol=
t to Kup, "We can watch from the observation
room." he said, pointing to cl=
ear plexiglass that showed a room on the
other side of it. "I'm sure some o=
f the others will be here to watch
too."

(TAG)

... Meanwhile a door or tw=
o away in the CR chamber . . .

Rat Trap and Quick stride are able to make =
a quick work of setting up
the CR chamber. The room is in generally good co=
ndition, as this room
has seen a lot of use over the years, and so has been=
 kept in good
repair.  A press of a few buttons a the spin of a few dials g=
ets all
the settings in place. The machine comes to life, lights go from re=
d,
to the yellow test modes and then finally green across the boards as
the=
 mahines are redy to accept new patients.

Airhammer and the much larger an=
d darker colored Noctorro come walking
in the room, the great horns on Noct=
orro's head, even in robot mode,
nearly scraping the ceiling as he entered.=
 They looked around as Rat
Trap and Quickstride are finishing.

"Where's Ro=
dimus?" Noctorro asked, his voice deep, powerful and
resonant. "Airhammer s=
aid he was under repairs?"

(TAG)

Preston

OOC: Noctorro and Airhammer can=

ay them EXACTLY as tech spec, but
